title: Drawing, "Designs for Fifteen Side Chairs", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor, traces of graphite on white laid paper
provenance: For the collection of Leon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Fifteen side chairs shown in front elevation, arranged in three rows. All of the chairs have upholstered seats showing a variety of textile patterns

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource
